perks.name: Novice Illusion
perks.description: Cast novice level illusion spells for half magicka.

perks.name: Illusion Dual Casting
perks.description: Dual casting an illusion spell overcharges the effects into a more powerful version.

perks.name: Hypnotic Gaze
perks.description: Calm spells now work on higher level opponents

perks.name: Aspect of Terror
perks.description: Fear spells now work on higher level opponents

perks.name: Novice Conjuration
perks.description: Cast novice level conjuration spells for half magicka.

perks.name: Summoner
perks.description: 1: Can summon atronachs or raise undead twice as far away. 2: Can summon atronachs or raise undead three times as far away.

perks.name: Augmented Flames
perks.description: 1: Fire spells do 25% more damage. 2: Fire spells do 50% more damage.

perks.name: Augmented Frost
perks.description: 1: Frost spells do 25% more damage. 2: Frost spells do 50% more damage.

perks.name: Augmented Shock
perks.description: 1: Shock spells do 25% more damage. 2: Shock spells do 50% more damage.
